name: Pompeii: a VR Experience
description:
Pompeii: a VR Experience Living Pompeii is now possible!

This is an experience enjoyable both via desktop and VR.

You'll be thrown headfirst into the city of Pompeii just a few days before the catastrophic volcano eruption. You'll live the everyday-life in Pompeii of several characters who belong to different social classes.

During the experience is possible to learn people habits (good or not) and to explore the city for gathering information about the architecture and the history, in particular in those days before the eruption of the Vesuvio in which the frequency of bad omens (such as earthquakes) increases daily.

Ending up to the fateful day, facing the eruption with all the courage and the effort you have.
